spiritsExplanation:
The workout titled "Climbing Tahoe Row" explicitly mentions rowing on Lake Tahoe, indicating a strong environmental and nature-based aspect, aligning with the "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit (score: 0.9). The description emphasizes climbing and altitude, creating a challenging, exhilarating environment.

The specified format as "Climb" and category "Sweat, standard, row," along with a mid-intensity rock playlist, suggest a vigorous workout aimed at elevating heart rates, matching the "High-Energy & Intense" spirit (score: 0.7). The intensity level of 2 out of 3 supports this classification as well.

The music choice and rhythm (max rhythm: 26) add a layer of flow, driven by rock beats, supporting the "Flow & Rhythm" spirit (score: 0.5). This implies a connection between movement and music, crafting an engaging rowing experience.

Thus, while primarily "Outdoor & Adventure," the workout also embodies elements of intensity and musical flow.
